news.title: Justia Legal Resources: Bankruptcy Law Center
news.description: Bankruptcy can give a debtor a chance to put their finances back together, but navigating the process is not always straightforward. The Bankruptcy Law Center in the Justia Legal Guides covers some basic considerations to keep in mind.

news.title: Justia Legal Resources: Car Accidents Legal Center
news.description: In a matter of moments, a car crash can change a victimâ€™s life forever. However, they may have important legal rights to assert. The Car Accidents Legal Center at Justia can help guide them through these challenging times.

news.title: Justia CLE & Webinars: How AI Impacts Small & Solo Firms
news.description: Artificial Intelligence (AI): the two words that just a few years ago seemed like a distant future, but are now slowly becoming a part of everyday life. However, even as people and businesses increasingly use AI for everyday use, there are still a lot of questions to be had. Stay ahead of the curve and learn about AI and its effect on your firm in this webinar!
